sentences.en: A monarch has the prerogative of pardoning criminals.
sentences.cn: 君主享有对罪犯的赦免权.

sentences.en: A monarch should be a broad - minded man of vision.
sentences.cn: 作为一国国君应该有宽广的胸怀与眼光.

sentences.en: An isolated mountaintop in central Mexico is covered each winter with orange - and - black monarch butterflies.
sentences.cn: 每到冬天,墨西哥中部的一座孤山顶上就栖满一种橙褐色的大蝴蝶.

sentences.en: Britain's head of state is a constitutional monarch.
sentences.cn: 英国的国家元首是君主立宪的国王或女王。

sentences.en: Country is governed by an elected legislature and prime minister, with a monarch as a symbolic head of state.
sentences.cn: 国家由选举产生的立法机关和首相治理，由一个君主作为国家的象征性领袖。

sentences.en: I do seem to be a broken - down monarch of some kind.
sentences.cn: 我倒有点象个落魄的王孙.

sentences.en: I think myself happier now than the greatest monarch upon earth.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这个时候比世界上什么帝王都快乐.

sentences.en: New monarch home and foreign course 55, add carriage airplane 50.
sentences.cn: 新辟国内及国外航线55条, 增加运输飞机50架.

sentences.en: Revolutionary ideas are in the air, and at least one monarch meets a bloody end!
sentences.cn: 革命的思想到处散播，和至少一个君主会遇到一个血腥的结局！

sentences.en: The chaos XiChuan mainland have no common monarch, challenge and up and scuffle, force is the only capital survive, the world is made of the strong, generation dream.
sentences.cn: 混乱的西川大陆上没有了共同的君主，群雄并起而混战，武力是生存下去的唯一本钱，制霸天下，是一代代强者的梦想。

sentences.en: The King is a mighty monarch but full of pride, harsh and cruel.
sentences.cn: 那个国王是个威势无比的君主而且十分傲慢, 生性残暴,待人苛刻.

sentences.en: The lion is the monarch of the jungle.
sentences.cn: 狮为丛林之王.

sentences.en: The monarch was ousted by a military coup.
sentences.cn: 那君主被军事政变者废黜了。

sentences.en: The monarch's role is purely ceremonial.
sentences.cn: 君主纯粹是个礼仪职位.

sentences.en: The monstrous monarch monopolied monarchy.
sentences.cn: 可怕的君主垄断了君主国。

sentences.en: The only real connecting link was the monarch himself.
sentences.cn: 唯一的实际联系是君主本人.

sentences.en: They met at the Union Station for the midnight train to Monarch.
sentences.cn: 他们在联合车站集合,然后搭上那趟午夜去莫纳克的火车.

sentences.en: This reverend crowd would like to know what monarch was at, just at this moment.
sentences.cn: 这群德隆道高的人的确想知道, 就在目前这一刹那,那位皇帝正在做什么事情.

sentences.en: This signified his claim to be a universal monarch.
sentences.cn: 这表明他自命为宇宙君王.

sentences.en: Those right-wing people who most honour their monarch see no reason for any apology.
sentences.cn: 那些对君主最为尊崇的右翼人士认为没有理由作出道歉。

sentences.en: To his own people, Solomon was a wasteful and oppressive monarch.
sentences.cn: 对他本国人民来说, 所罗门是个挥霍、残暴的君主.

sentences.en: While 64% think the monarch should retire, only 31% do not.
sentences.cn: 64%的人认为君主应该退休，只有31%的人表示反对。

words.tran_cn: 君主的，君主政治的；国王的
君主政体的；君主的；赞成君主政体的
君主的，国王的；君主政治的
君主政体；君主国；君主政治

trans.tran_cn: 君主，帝王，最高统治者，[动]黑脉金斑蝶
